meanings.definition: To surpass in storytelling or fabrication.
meanings.sent1: She always tries to outfables her friends with her imaginative stories.

meanings.sent5: His storytelling skills were so impressive that he could easily outfables anyone in the room.

meanings.definition: To outdo in creating fictional tales.
meanings.sent1: The young writer hoped to outfables her favorite author one day.
